Spy"/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said. "It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body."

will be the next speaker in the World Within Reach Speaker Series, which has also featured Colin Powell , Karl Rove , Howard Dean , and most recently, Barbara Walters . The Speaker Series is an initiative by the SA to bring engaging speakers in public affairs, entertainment, and business to the University at Albany to gain insight from their unique perspective. So far all speakers have had a political background, with the exception of Barbara Walters , a journalist.
